overview: A televised film of Peter Stein's landmark 1971 production of Henrik Ibsen's Peer Gynt, staged at the Schaubühne. The staging, produced for broadcast by NDR Fernsehen, saw five actors (including Bruno Ganz) portraying Gynt over the two-evening, five-hour performance.
tagline: Peter Stein's adaptation of Henrik Ibsen's Peer Gynt, filmed at Berlin's Schaubühne
title: Peer Gynt
